codepen-io_key2: Javascript exercises ko karne ke liye hum `code`pen.io use karenge.
codepen-io_key3: `Code`pen.io par jakar apna free basic account banaye. Uske baad apni email id verify karo.
codepen-io_key4: "New Pen" par click kar kar, aap apna `code` likhna shuru karein
codepen-io_key5: HTML/CSS/JS `editor` mein jo likha hua hai, woh already aapas mei linked hai. Aap seedha `code` likhna shuru kar sakte hai.
codepen-io_key6: `Code` likhne ke baad "`Save`" par click kar kar, apna `code` ka URL slack par apne facilitator ke saath share karo
codepen-io_key8: Aap `code`pen.io mei HTML aur CSS likh kar ek aap aisa `code` likhe jisse aapka naam kisi bhi black ke alawa color mei dikhe. Iske liye aap ko bahut thodi si HTMl ya CSS likhni hogi. Aisa karne mei aapko 4-5 minute lagne chahiye. Agar aapko isse jyada lag raha hai toh aap kisi ki madad li jiye.
